attributes.action: The immediate release of hero Sgt Blackman, and quashing of his conviction!
attributes.additional_details:
We believe in light of the discrepancies and taking into account the circumstances, Blackman is a hero not a criminal. Find out more about the horrendous treatment and betrayal of Sgt Blackman below:

http://www.justiceforsgtblackman.co.uk/

http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-3231319/A-shameful-injustice-reveal-brass-plot-cover-vital-evidence-vindicate-Marine-given-life-murdering-Taliban-heat-battle.html

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-26965823

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-34217252
attributes.background: We believe that sending a man to war and then imprisoning him for killing the already mortally wounded enemy is a betrayal. The cover-up in this case brings the Forces into disrepute. We demand that Sgt Blackman is released, his conviction quashed, compensation paid and those involved are arrested.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/108570

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
